title: RITO PLS I NEED 57 RP FOR A DIANA SKIN
body: WHY DO I DESERVET HIS TORTURE  {{item:3070}} {{champion:131}}

replies.body: I actually heard of someone getting around 30 RP when they drew a picture, but Riot told them they wouldn't do that for them again. 57 might be pushing it.
You need to do a damned good tribute to get 57 RP. Most I've heard anyone get is 10 RP. 57 is kinda steep to just give away.
diana bandwagonner just bc she got played in a game of lcs gg
